headline: Does Expedia Still Offer Value After a 55% Rally in 2025?
summary: If you are wondering whether Expedia Group is still a smart buy after such a big run or if you are late to the party, this breakdown will help you decide whether the current price still stacks up to the fundamentals. The stock has climbed 1.1% over the last week, 16.5% over the past month, and is up 55.5% year to date, adding to an impressive 53.2% 1-year gain and a 235.7% return over 3 years. These moves come as travel demand has continued to normalize post pandemic and investors have...
